reviewText: The length of this DVD was short but sweet. I plan to buy the other ABT DVD. I just hope that DVD will have more ballet pieces

Felt gypped by undistinguished modern pieces, lame choreography, mundane music. Left me yearning for classical ballet. You should warn the buyer when you're not including enough classical, or at least give us the bill of fare. I thought I could always count on ABT. I can't.
Our friend loves, loves, loves the ballet and she said the DVD was simply beautiful.  Her young daughter even enjoyed it.

One of my favourite DVDs to introduce young people to ballet because it has such a variety of music and dance.  A teaser as it were, but a good way to show novices to the world of ballet that all ballet is not just classical, and classic, Tchaikovsky.  I bought this copy to give to my granddaughters for Easter.  Besides, it is a performance that I actually attended.
